title: getting a 10 minute wait in queue for Router troubles is stupid!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
body: i am now forced to wait 10 minutes for 5 games it was 5 minutes the first time and i did leave 3 of the 5 games but the other 2 were modem issues now i have stayed in every game no matter how bad and it's all router issues this is crap my router is dieing i keep trying to reconnect you could see this if you even looked at logs now i'm slumped with a 10 minute wait to play in the end i'd rather spend my money in dota 2 or heroes of the storm then wait 10 minutes for something i have no control over .

replies.body:
TBH it's your own fault, you shouldn't be playing any sort of game if your router is dying or your internet is disconnecting all the time, that's your own fault, not riot's.. it is apart of the rules, if you don't have stable internet, don't play.. 

Your not just ruining the experience for yourself and gaining this 10 minute queue time, but ruining it for other people to by continuing to play with your bad internet connection.

Find the issue, fix the issue, then play

if you can't respond to customers then you don't deserve those customers i have seen many posts on these forums that ask for riots feedback or answers to questions only riot can answer yet no responses why is that ??? I think it's becuase riot doesn't give a shit about it's customers which is stupid because without us you have no riot games .

actually i'd like a refund for the money and riot points i have sitting in my account as i am unable to use them in a game without waiting like 50 minutes( yes 50 as in 10 minutes per queue for 5 games ) to even play who has this time it takes over 35 minutes to play a game now u make people wait extra for connection issues so refund my money so i can spend it on heroes of the storm atleast blizzard gms would give a shit
